participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and cheerful, loves spending time outdoors and enjoys music.
participant_1.background: I like listening to the Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach. I feed my dogs and take them for a walk before I start my day. I am also round. I have one little girl. I like sports.

participant_2.name: Sam
participant_2.personality: Creative and open-minded, enjoys music and exploring new interests.
participant_2.background: I live in a city where the weather is unpredictable. I am headed to University of Michigan in the fall. I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself. My favorite show is Tom and Jerry. I like to fly kites.

content.text: Hello how is your day going?
Hello, my day is going well so far. How about you?
Good! I am listening to The Beatles while I'm walking my dog on the beach.
That sounds fun! I love The Beatles. I like to go fly kites on the beach when it's sunny out.
I have never flown a kite before.
You should try it, it's a lot of fun.
I might have to try it sometime.
You should! I'm headed to University of Michigan in the fall.
Oh, that's exciting! What are you going to study there?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm interested in music.
That's awesome! I love music too.
Thanks! I'm also passionate about it.
What type of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm especially into alternative rock and pop music.
I like alternative rock too. What are some of your favorite bands?
I like Twenty One Pilots, The Killers, and Panic! At The Disco.
I like those bands too! We should listen to them together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Me too! I love discovering new music.
We should exchange music recommendations sometime.
That's a great idea
